scripts.prod: yarn run prepipe:prod && MM_ENV=prod bundle exec middleman build -e prod
scripts.prod:clean: yarn run clean && yarn run data:live && yarn run prepipe:prod && MM_ENV=prod bundle exec middleman build -e prod
scripts.prod:deploy: yarn run clean && yarn run data:live && yarn run prepipe:prod && MM_ENV=prod bundle exec middleman build -e prod
scripts.preview: yarn run prepipe:prod && MM_ENV=preview bundle exec middleman build -e preview
scripts.preview:clean: yarn run clean && yarn run data:preview && yarn run prepipe:prod && MM_ENV=preview bundle exec middleman build -e preview
scripts.preview:deploy: yarn run clean && yarn run data:preview && yarn run prepipe:prod && MM_ENV=preview bundle exec middleman build -e preview
scripts.dev:clean: yarn run clean && yarn run data:preview && MM_ENV=dev bundle exec middleman server
scripts.exp: yarn run prepipe:prod && MM_ENV=exp bundle exec middleman build -e exp
scripts.exp:clean: yarn run clean && yarn run data:experimental && yarn run prepipe:prod && MM_ENV=exp bundle exec middleman build -e exp
scripts.exp:deploy: yarn run clean && yarn run data:experimental && yarn run prepipe:prod && MM_ENV=exp bundle exec middleman build -e exp
